verses.name: Leviticus 21:15
verses.text: Neither shall he profane his seed among his people: for I the Lord do sanctify him.

verses.name: Leviticus 21:16
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 21:17
verses.text: Speak unto Aaron, saying, Whosoever he be of thy seed in their generations that hath any blemish, let him not approach to offer the bread of his God.

verses.name: Leviticus 21:18
verses.text: For whatsoever man he be that hath a blemish, he shall not approach: a blind man, or a lame, or he that hath a flat nose, or any thing superfluous,

verses.name: Leviticus 21:19
verses.text: Or a man that is brokenfooted, or brokenhanded,
